    BaseRequestValidator<T extends Annotation,V>
    Abstract base class for custom validation logic applied to RequestDto fields.
    BoxWeightValidator
    Validator for checking the maximum weight of a box against specific constraints.
    ItemPriceValidator
    Validator for checking the weight of an item against specific constraints.

    Validator for ensuring the price of an item adheres to specified constraints.

    Custom validation annotation for ensuring the weight of a box meets specific criteria.

    Custom constraint annotation for validating the price of an item.
